pullrequest.title: Added models for the ARAT grasp tasks

content.raw: In 182e143ae2c5 (branch arat_objects_scpeters), I went ahead and made erb templates for these wooden blocks using a density value of 500 kg/m^3 (approximate value for a soft wood like pine, based on [parameter table here](http://www.engineeringtoolbox.com/wood-density-d_40.html)). It ends up reducing a lot of the mass values.
content.html: In 182e143ae2c5 (branch arat_objects_scpeters), I went ahead and made erb templates for these wooden blocks using a density value of 500 kg/m^3 (approximate value for a soft wood like pine, based on parameter table here). It ends up reducing a lot of the mass values.
